name: Stop the Train
description:
Your girlfriend is in danger - she's tied to the tracks and train is slowly approaching!

Good thing is that you're on that train!

Convince train driver with valuable things and try to delay time until the crash.I'm sure you'll save her. Maybe. I don't know.

This is puzzle game. Ask various people on the train if they have anything to give you, convince them to help and deliver the items to the driver. Time doubles every time you make a deal with him. Hint: There are 5 items that he will like.
There is one ending with two variations, depending if you manage to find all items.
Time stops when you talk to people.

Arrow keys - moving

Z - advancing dialogue, interacting
